item.title: Setting Up Postgres on Mac OSX with Homebrew
item.description: I ran into some challenges installing postgres via homebrew. I attempted to follow these instruction, as is advised by the postgres website but ran into further problems. The following steps outline how I was able to finally work around the problems. Note that I’m using Mac OSX 10.6.8. Uninstall old versions of postgres: brew rm postgresql --force Update homebrew: brew update Install postgres: brew install postgresql Make a postgres directory:
